department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: “The design of this course allows students to discuss with their supervisors some specific topics that interest them. The students have to read papers regarding the topic to build their knowledge and learn the research method and methodologies for general problem solving. Meanwhile, this course may include system implementation to enhance students‘ programming skills.“
goal.ch: 本課程設計得讓學生自行尋找專題指導教授，針對特定主題進行研究與實作，使學生瞭解相關主題知識以及專題研究方法與步驟，同時培養學生實作資訊系統的能力。

content.en:
“1 Introduction
2 Operating System Structures
3 Processes
4 Threads and Concurrency
5 CPU Scheduling
6 Synchronization Tools
7 Synchronization Examples
8 Deadlocks
9 Main Memory
10 Virtual Memory
11 Mass Storage Structure
12 I/O Systems
13 File System Interface
14 File System Implementation
15 File System Internals
16 Security
17 Protection
18 Virtual Machines
19 Networks and Distributed Systems
20 Case studies“

textbook.en:
“Book title : Operating System Concepts (Tenth Edition)
Author : Abraham Silberschatz, Peter baer galvin and Greg Gagne
Publisher: John Wiley ＆ Sons, INC“
